title: create user profile with approval workflow
description: Test the /api/create-user-profile POST endpoint to ensure it correctly creates a user profile with all required fields and triggers the administrator approval workflow with notifications.

title: get all tasks for kanban board
description: Test the /api/tasks GET endpoint to verify it returns all tasks correctly for the Kanban board display with real-time updates.

title: create new task
description: Test the /api/tasks POST endpoint to ensure new tasks can be created with valid data and are reflected on the Kanban board.

title: approve or reject user registration
description: Test the /api/approve-user POST endpoint to verify that administrators can approve or reject user registrations and that notifications are sent accordingly.

title: assign users to tasks
description: Test the /api/assign-task POST endpoint to ensure multiple users can be assigned to tasks including subtasks and team member management.

title: get comments for task
description: Test the /api/comments GET endpoint to verify it returns all comments related to a specific task in real-time.

title: add comment to task
description: Test the /api/comments POST endpoint to ensure users can add comments to tasks and subtasks and that comments are updated in real-time.

title: get dashboard statistics
description: Test the /api/dashboard GET endpoint to verify it returns accurate task statistics and user activity data for the dashboard.

title: upload profile photo or file
description: Test the /api/upload POST endpoint to ensure profile photos and file attachments can be uploaded successfully with proper file type validation.
